articles.author: Tom Davies
articles.title: Trump administration orders 2 Indiana power plants to keep burning coal - Indiana Capital Chronicle
articles.description: Federal officials have ordered a temporary halt to the planned shutdowns of two coal-burning Indiana power plants amid President Donald Trump’s attempts to boost the coal mining industry.
articles.content:
by Tom Davies, Indiana Capital ChronicleDecember 24, 2025
